alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 24 at 2:21PM PDT until March 25 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PDT SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch above 2500 feet, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches possible. * WHERE...Del Norte Interior County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon PDT Saturday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Monday afternoon through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
